name: Ancho-Orange Hot Fudge
description: Since I'm a sucker for the orange and chocolate combo and the pleasing mild heat of ancho chiles, this was like hot fudge on crack for me.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup unsweetened Dutch Processed cocoa powder
Kosher or sea salt, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter, corn syrup, brown sugar, cocoa powder, and chocolate in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium-low heat until chocolate is fully melted, stirring constantly.
Stir in evaporated milk, bring to a boil, and continue to cook until sauce thickens, about 5 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Remove from heat and add in vanilla, chili powder, and orange extract; stir to combine. Season with salt to taste. Let sauce cool until warm, then serve over ice cream or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week, reheating before use.
